title: Post-Meal Rituals: Quick Ayurvedic Aids for Digestion
author: Harish
excerpt: Discover how simple digestive mixes like sesame churna can ease heaviness and support easy digestion.
content:
The Power of Post-Meal Rituals

Ayurveda encourages gentle digestive support after meals to prevent heaviness and encourage nutrient absorption. Churnas—powdered spice blends—are among the simplest tools for this.

Why Sesame Churna Works

  • Sesame: Warming, grounding, Vata-balancing.
  • Fennel: Cooling carminative that reduces acidity.
  • Cumin: Stimulates Agni and reduces bloating.
  • Rock Salt: Enhances digestion and absorption.

How to Use

Take 1/4–1/2 tsp after meals, or stir into warm water for a gentle digestive tonic.

Additional Ayurvedic Tips

  • Walk for 5 minutes post-meal.
  • Avoid iced water which weakens Agni.
  • Eat mindfully and don’t overmix food types.

Shop Organic Sesame Churna to support daily digestion.
